meanings.definition: A Filipino dish consisting of a thin pastry filled with a mixture of meat and vegetables, typically served fried.
meanings.sent1: I love to eat lumpias at family gatherings.
meanings.sent2: The lumpias at the party were delicious.
meanings.sent3: The lumpias told jokes to the spring rolls at the food festival.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as warm and comforting as a freshly fried lumpia.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of lumpias cooking filled the kitchen with happiness.
